episodes.title: Unmasking the Ohio Cult: Queen Belemzy's Reign of Power & Online Witch Hunts
episodes.description: Join us as we delve deep into the disturbing world of the School of Power Ministries, led by the enigmatic Queen Belemzy. In this eye-opening stream, we uncover how this Ohio-based cult operates online, targeting and demonising women who dare to disagree with their leader. Learn how loyal followers, eager to please Queen Belemzyof, produce videos speaking evil, branding dissenters as witches and much worse. Hear from the cult leader Belema and her followers and discover the shocking truth behind this dangerous and manipulative group. Don’t miss this critical exposé

episodes.title: Africa’s Deadliest Christian Cult- over 400 dead including kids. @Paul Mackenzie
episodes.description:
Join me for this one, exposing the evil in the religion of Christianity. This is Kenya’s doomsday cult where victims have crossed the 400 mark as detectives exhumed 12 more bodies on believed to be followers of a pastor who ordered them to fast to death in order to meet Jesus. Apparently the number of those who died has risen to 403, with 95 people rescued.
Paul Mackenzie has been charged with murder after the bodies were found buried in shallow graves in the remote forest of Shakahola in the east of the country.
Survivors and victims' families have said Paul Mackenzie urged followers to fast in order to "go see Jesus".
He and 29 others pleaded not guilty in a court in the coastal town of Malindi.
Mackenzie has already been charged with committing acts of terror, child cruelty and torture, which he denied.
